reviewText: One of those episodic films very well done with a fabulous cast traces a panorama of the italians sometimes sad sometimes fun, but always with their unique sense of humor. Catherine Spaak as a fake rich teen, Virna Lisi as a fortune hunter, and above all Anna Magnani's odissey to have an icecream on sunday with her family. Great!

Language: Italian
Subtitles: English

NO CORRECT LANGUAGE (it's not in italian!!!! as it's written in insertion) AND SUBTITLES AVAILABLE!!!!!

I'm very disappointed

Tris is a most entertaining portrait of Italian culture in the 60's. I first saw this film on TV in my home country and dubbed into Spanish. I wish the DVD transfer had ketp the original language and had added captions in other languages.
